title: Creating a Ranked 5 for S6
body:
So im trying to join a team but no team i can find really wants to play much and/or they are too tryhard and wanting to join OPL and stuff. Anyways, im going to make a team which i want friendly people who DONT think they are the best players in the world and DO want to improve. I'm Currently Silver 5 and am looking for anyone B3 or higher who wants to make a team WITH me. I don't want to be THE leader, and dont want to be THE captain. Also looking for people who want to improve as individuals as well as in coordination with team. Also would be nice if u didn't mind voice chatting (don't want it to be awkward if u don't want to but its pref)

Please leave the following below:
IGN:
Role: 

Add me: XPitchPleaseX
